dcterms:creator: Berk Calli
Aaron Walsman
Arjun Singh
Siddhartha Srinivasa
Pieter Abbeel
Aaron M. Dollar
dcterms:description: A standard robotics dataset for training and evaluating 3D perception systems, consisting of real RGB-D images featuring the 21 YCB objects collected from videos of 12 different scenes.
dcterms:title: YCB-Video

dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset created by the authors, consisting of 2000 RGB-D images containing objects from the YCB object set, designed to challenge 6DoF pose estimation.
dcterms:title: YCB-Challenging

dcterms:creator: Berk Calli
Aaron Walsman
Arjun Singh
Siddhartha Srinivasa
Pieter Abbeel
Aaron M. Dollar
dcterms:description: A set of objects used in the YCB-Video and YCB-Challenging datasets, providing a standardized collection for benchmarking in manipulation research.
dcterms:title: YCB Object Set
